name: QUADRATIC EQUATION
description:
In this kata you have to write a code that takes the values of the numbers  a , b , —Å  which correspond to the quadratic equation ax^2+bx+c=0 and print the number of correct answers.
For example:

a=1 , b=2 , c=1 ;

The answer will be 1 .

Note:
The numbers will always be integers.
